name: voluminous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A voluminous piece of clothing is large and consists of a lot of cloth: Her voluminous silk dress billowed out behind her.
A voluminous piece of writing is long and detailed: Have you read McClelland's voluminous account of his life?
